mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TASK(TNO, TLEVEL, TMNO, TENDDATE, TTPRIORITY, TTITLE, TCONTENT, TSTARTDATE, TWRITER, TPNO, TWRITEDATE) VALUES (SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL, #{tlevel}, #{tmno}, TO_DATE(#{tenddate},'MM/DD/RRRR'), #{ttpriority}, #{ttitle}, #{tcontent}, TO_DATE(#{tstartdate},'MM/DD/RRRR'), #{twriter}, #{tpno}, SYSDATE)
SELECT SEQ_TNO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TASK_FILE(FNO, FOLDNAME, FNEWNAME, FPATH, FTNO) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{foldname}, #{fnewname}, #{fpath}, #{ftno})
mapper.select: SELECT TS.*, T.*,TF.* , P.RENAMEDFILENAME, M.NICKNAME FROM TASK TS LEFT JOIN TASK_FILE TF ON(TS.TNO = TF.FTNO) LEFT JOIN PROJECT PJ ON(TS.TPNO = PJ.PNO) LEFT JOIN TASK_COMMENT T ON (TS.TNO = T.CTNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (T.CWRITER = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN PROFILE_IMG P ON (M.MPROFILE = P.IMGNO) WHERE PNO = #{pno} ORDER BY TWRITEDATE DESC, CWRITEDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE TASK SET TLEVEL = #{tlevel}, TSTARTDATE = TO_DATE(#{tstartdate},'MM/DD/RRRR'), TENDDATE = TO_DATE(#{tenddate},'MM/DD/RRRR'), TTPRIORITY = #{ttpriority}, TTITLE = #{ttitle}, TCONTENT = #{tcontent} WHERE TNO = #{tno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TASK LEFT JOIN TASK_FILE ON(TASK.TNO = TASK_FILE.FTNO) JOIN MEMBER ON(MEMBER.MNO = TASK.TMNO) WHERE TMNO = #{mno} ORDER BY TWRITEDATE DESC

SELECT distinct PJ.PTITLE PTTITLE, TNO, TTITLE, TMNO, TCONTENT, TWRITEDATE, M.NICKNAME, TPNO FROM TASK TK JOIN MEMBER M ON (TK.TMNO = M.MNO) JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER PM ON (PMPNO = TPNO) JOIN PROJECT PJ ON (TK.TPNO = PJ.PNO) WHERE M.NICKNAME Like '%' || #{searchWd} || '%' OR TCONTENT Like '%' || #{searchWd} || '%' OR TTITLE Like '%' || #{searchWd} || '%' AND PM.PMPNO = PJ.PNO AND PMMNO = #{mno} ORDER BY TK.TNO DESC
